title: Unfair queue bans
body:
Recently I have received, what I view to be quite unfair queue bans for disconnecting from a match. This wasn't a ragequit, I wasn't inting, I wasn't afk. During two ranked games, my game has suddenly crashed, then when I try to reconnect I get a direct x error message and need to restart my PC entirely to reconnect, and by that point, the game is usually already over. I also occasionally have games in which this will happen in the loading screen, and that's how the errors started out. As of yesterday and today, my game has crashed twice, mid-game, in which im also quite positive is a result of the game itself, not my computer. Everything else was running fine, my discord call, even the league client voice chat was still working, yet my screen was frozen, and an error message on another tab was showing while I was holding alt-tab (however I couldn't actually alt-tab out of the game). I've tried fixing the direct x error through the client repair tool, I tried deleting some of the client folders and then using the repair tool (as this was the suggestion after a google search), I also tried completely reinstalling the game, nothing evidently worked as the most recent game I had, it has crashed again. Fortunately I was able to restart my PC fast enough and reconnect, however by this point I was well too far behind and the game was lost, I again received queue bans for leaving this game, even after reconnecting and playing it out to the end. Obviously it is an automated system that gives out the queue bans, but im posting this here because I am of the belief that they are quite unfair.

My in game name is Neon Gravestones, some advice on how I can try to fix these crashes or some feedback about my queue bans would be much appreciated. 
Thanks

replies.body:
At a point the system has to consider the impact you are having on other players, even if the leaves aren't intentional. This is especially true in ranked. YOu are clearly aware of the issue, and yet started a ranked game anyway? You aren't the only one impacted by your disconnects, nor are you the majority affected, and that consideration plays a role.

Regarding your client drama, it sounds like something is up with your DirectX install, especially if repairs and reinstall of the League client didn't resolve the issue.

I'd recommend updating your DirectX: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq3

You can also try any of the other steps in that support article that you haven't already. Failing that I'd recommend submitting a ticket to player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

Oh I completely reinstalled the game between the two ranked games, it had been suggested I reinstall the client by a friend who'd had a similar experience, evidently that didn't work.

My DirectX is up to date also, so I'll try sending through a ticket.

Thanks

Hmm if an uninstall and DirectX fixes haven't worked that's rather beyond my knowledge (tech just really isn't my area). LeaverBuster is harsher in ranked games so I'd probably recommend avoiding those (if you aren't already) until you've got stability back.

Sorry I couldn't help you more, hopefully support can get things fixed up for you quickly.
